bm_desc: BLUSPRING : 23-Jun-2025 :  The Company has informed the Exchange that a Board meeting to be held on Jun 25, 2025 has been re-scheduled. Further, the Company has informed the Exchange that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company will be held on Jun 23, 2025,  To consider and approve the financial results for the period ended March 31, 2025
To consider the brief term of Rights Issue including Equity shares to be offered through the issue, Issue Price per equity share, Right entitlement ratio, Terms of Payment, etc.
To consider Fund Raising and other business matters
To consider and approve the financial results for the period ended March 31, 2025

RAMRAT : 23-Jun-2025 :  The Company has informed the Exchange that a Board meeting scheduled to be held on Jun 16, 2025 has been re-scheduled. Further, the Company has informed the Exchange that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company will be held on Jun 23, 2025,  To consider and approve the re-adoption of financial statements for the quarter and year ended on March 31, 2025 to give effect to the Scheme of Amalgamation.
To consider and approve the financial results for the period ended March 31, 2025 and other business matters

To consider other business matters:1.Report of Board of Directors along with Management Discussion & Analysis Report, Business Reporting & Sustainability Report (BRSR) and Corporate Governance Report and other Annexures for the Financial Year ended March 31, 2025;2.Date and time for holding the 30th Annual General Meeting of the company and to approve draft Notice of the same;3.Appointment of the scrutinizer for the purpose of e-voting and for ballot voting at 30th Annual General Meeting of the Company;4.Appointment of M/s. M S K A & Associates, Chartered Accountants, (ICAI Firm Registration No. 105047W) as Statutory Auditors of the Company for a period of 5 years and to recommend the same for approval of shareholders of the Company and5.Appointment of Mr. Santosh Kumar Pradhan, Practising Company Secretary as the Secretarial Auditor for the period of 5 years and to recommend the same for approval of shareholders of the Company.
To consider other business matters

DPWIRES : 24-Jun-2025 :  The Company has informed the Exchange that a Board meeting to be held on Jun 21, 2025 has been re-scheduled. Further, the Company has informed the Exchange that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company will be held on Jun 24, 2025,  To consider other business matters
To consider Fund Raising
To consider Fund Raising by way of debt issue in the form of debentures, subject to requisite approvals.
Valiant Organics Limited has informed the Exchange that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company scheduled to be held on Jun 25, 2025 To consider Fund Raising has been postponed
To consider and approve the financial results for the quarter and financial year ended March 31, 2025
To consider Fund Raising
To consider Fund Raising
To consider Fund Raising by way of a Rights Issue to the eligible equity shareholders of the Company, subject to the receipt of applicable regulatory/statutory approvals as may be required
To inter alia consider and approve the audited financial results for the quarter and financial year ended March 31, 2025
To consider Fund Raising
Board Meeting Intimation for considering Capital Plan of the Bank for FY 2025-26.
To consider Fund Raising
